ConnectionManager
MonoBehaviour
[RequireComponent(typeof(MessageReceiver), typeof(InputActionManager)), DisallowMultipleComponent, DefaultExecutionOrder(1)]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Connection.​ConnectionManager

This Class manages the connection to the Service. It provides static variables for ease of use and is a Singleton to allow for easy referencing.

Variables
OnConnected
public static event Action OnConnected

An event which is emitted when Connect is called.

Instead of adding listeners to this event, use AddConnectionListener to ensure that your function is invoked if the connection has already been made by the time your class runs.

currentServiceConnection
static ServiceConnection currentServiceConnection

The private reference to the currently managed ServiceConnection.

serviceConnection
public static ServiceConnection serviceConnection {
get
}

The public get-only reference to the currently managed ServiceConnection.

messageReceiver
public static MessageReceiver messageReceiver

A reference to the receiver that handles destribution of data received via the currentServiceConnection if connected.

HandFound
public static event Action HandFound

An event allowing users to react to a hand being found when none has been present for a moment.

HandsLost
public static event Action HandsLost

An event allowing users to react to the last hand being lost when one has been present.

iPAddress
[Header("WebSocket connection values")]
[SerializeField]
string iPAddress

The IP Address that will be used in the ServiceConnection to connect to the target WebSocket.  This value is settable in the Inspector.

port
[SerializeField]
string port

The Port that will be used in the ServiceConnection to connect to the target WebSocket.  This value is settable in the Inspector.

Functions
AddConnectionListener
public static void AddConnectionListener(
Action _onConnectFunc
)

Used to both add the _onConnectFunc action to the listeners of OnConnected as well as auto-call the _onConnectFunc if a connection is already made.

Connect
public void Connect()

Creates a new ServiceConnection using iPAddress and port.  Also invokes OnConnected on all listeners.

Disconnect
public static void Disconnect()

Disconnects currentServiceConnection if it is connected to a WebSocket and sets it to null.

HandleHandPresenceEvent
internal static void HandleHandPresenceEvent(
HandPresenceState _state
)

Called by the <MessageReciever> to pass HandPresence events via the HandFound and HandsLost events on this class

Unity monoBehaviour overrides
Awake
private void Awake()

Run by Unity on Initialization. Finds the required MessageReceiver component.  Also attempts to immediately Connect to a WebSocket.

OnEnable
private void OnEnable()

Unity's OnEnable function for handling when the behaviour is enabled. Connects to SC Service if not already connected.

OnDisable
private void OnDisable()

Unity's OnDisable function for handling when the behaviour is disabled. Disconnects from SC Service to prevent caching any new incoming inputs.

OnDestroy
private void OnDestroy()

Unity's Destroy function for handling the deconstruction of a MonoBehaviour.  Ensures Disconnect is called.
